member.name: T:Tracery.GrammarExtensions
member.summary: Extension methods for setting up Humanizer-based modifiers in a .

member.name: M:Tracery.GrammarExtensions.AddTracery(Tracery.Grammar)
member.summary: Adds the built-in Tracery modifiers to the specified .
member.param: The to which modifiers are added.
member.returns: The so that additional calls can be chained.
